description: Biomechanical rules for push-up form evaluation

elbow_min_bend.description: Minimum elbow bend at bottom of push-up (degrees)

hip_sag_threshold.description: Maximum deviation from straight body line (degrees)
hip_sag_threshold.failure_message: Hip sag detected - keep body straight

symmetry_tolerance.description: Maximum acceptable difference between left and right elbows (degrees)
symmetry_tolerance.failure_message: Asymmetric form - left and right arms not balanced

trunk_alignment_max.description: Maximum trunk deviation from plank position (degrees)

phase_detection.description: Thresholds for detecting push-up phases based on average elbow angle
